attributes.action: Review and change procedures within the Social Services system
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
More intense training for Social Workers is needed then hopefully alot less mistakes will be made within the system, which as a result has left children at the hands of thier abusers,it is not hard to spot an abused child most of the time (Baby P for example).

More options for struggling familes who are ripped apart when all that is needed is some support and guidance.

More care for those children that are in care.

Better support for children that leave the care system.

Better support and more facilities for parents and children that are facing custody hearings as a result of a relationship breakdown,in the majority of the cases Social Services get involved and they get treated badly and wrongly.

rejection.details:
There are many petitions about the review of social servces. Please see:

http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/StopAbuseBabies/
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/Baby-P-Review/
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/futuresocialcare/
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/SS-Watchdog/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
